item.title: Draw Photo Histograms: D3 + Canvas
item.description: Exploring histograms using vanilla JavaScript, D3, and the FileReader API.

item.title: Binary Tree Application: Binary Space Partitioning
item.description: Binary space partitioning recursively subdivides a space. It is an application of binary trees and often used for procedurally generated game levels or computational art.

item.title: Koch Snowflakes
item.description: Building Fractal Art with Koch Snowflakes on HTML5 Canvas.

item.title: Pixl: A Sea of CSS [part 5]
item.description: Add CSS styling to make the app responsive on multiple screen sizes using media queries and flexbox.

item.title: Pixl: Scaling & Saving Art [part 4]
item.description: Enabling save and restore of images using the browser's localStorage API.

item.title: Pixl: Scaling & Saving Art [part 3]
item.description: Canvas scaling, transparent backgrounds, and a first step at saving the images.

item.title: Pixl: Color Palette & Enhanced UI [part 2]
item.description: Adding a randomized color palette selector using jscolor.

item.title: Pixl: A Pixel Art Editor w/Canvas [part 1]
item.description: A full-featured, 5-part tutorial on creating a pixel art editor using JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas. Supports saving and loading images, color selection, transparent backgrounds, and more.

item.title: Fractal Art and Sierpinski Triangles
item.description: Building a Sierpinski Triangle with HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript.
